entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
